title: Configure a single firewall utility
description: CIS Ubuntu Linux 24.04 LTS Benchmark - Section 4.1: Configure a single firewall utility

controls.title: Ensure a single firewall configuration utility is in use
controls.description: The cron daemon is used to execute batch jobs on the system.
controls.remediation:
- IF - cron is installed on the system:
Run the following commands to unmask, enable, and start cron :
# systemctl unmask "$(systemctl list -unit-files | awk '$1~/^crond? \.service/print $1')"
# systemctl --now enable "$(systemctl list -unit-files | awk '$1~/^crond? \.service/print $1')"
